p.s: The given sonnet Sonnet 65 consists of three quatrains inclunsing cross ehymes and final couplet which rhymes in pair form.
The meter of the sonnet is the iambic pentameter such as all Shakespearean sonnets.
Sonnet 65 is about the hard times in love but how it still will remain and does not fade.
A central theme in this sonnet is the nature which appears frequently.
Also beauty and transitoriness are included in the poem.
